question:
The National Health Mission:
1. covers rural as well as the urban areas of the country
2. covers communicable as well as non communicable diseases
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: The National Urban Health Mission (NUHM) was launched in 2013 as a sub-mission of National Health Mission (NHM), with National Rural Health Mission (NRHM) being the other Submission. Allocation of Rs. 20,000 crore has been made for National Health Mission for rural and urban during 2013-14. For a better coverage check below link: http://www.gktoday.in/blog/national-health-mission/
